meanings.meaning: 1. end; finish; place to stop Usually written using kana alone
2. bound; limit; end Usually written using kana alone, See also 切りがない
3. delivery date (of a futures contract) Finance, Only applies to 限り, Only applies to 限
4. finale (of a noh song); end of an act (in jōruri or kabuki); final performance of the day (in vaudeville)
5. trump card
6. king (court card; in mekuri karuta and unsun karuta) Card games
7. counter for slices (esp. thick slices); counter for cuts (of fish, meat, etc.) 彼はそこに行ったきり２度と帰ってこなかった。He went there, never to return.
8. only; just Usually written using kana alone, See also っきり, sometimes pronounced ぎり彼は３８歳なのに両親に頼りきりです。Though 38, he is still dependent on his parents.
9. (ever) since; after Usually written using kana alone, usu. in a negative sentence; sometimes pronounced ぎり
10. continuously; remaining (in a particular state) Usually written using kana alone, sometimes pronounced ぎり
限り 【きり】、切 【きり】、限 【きり】
切: Irregular okurigana usage. 限: Irregular okurigana usage.

8. only; just Usually written using kana alone, See also っきり, sometimes pronounced ぎり彼は３８歳なのに両親に頼りきりです。Though 38, he is still dependent on his parents.
9. (ever) since; after Usually written using kana alone, usu. in a negative sentence; sometimes pronounced ぎり
10. continuously; remaining (in a particular state) Usually written using kana alone, sometimes pronounced ぎり
限り 【きり】、切 【きり】、限 【きり】
切: Irregular okurigana usage. 限: Irregular okurigana usage.

sentences.translation: He went there, never to return.
Though 38, he is still dependent on his parents.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to cut; to cut through; to perform (surgery) ２．大根は拍子木に切る。2. Cut the daikon into long sticks.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 2. to sever (connections, ties) See also 縁を切る

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 3. to turn off (e.g. the light) エアコンを切ってもかまいませんか。Do you mind if I turn off the AC?

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 4. to terminate (e.g. a conversation); to hang up (the phone); to disconnect See also 電話を切る「スミスさんをお願いしたいのですが」「そのまま切らずにお待ちください」"May I speak to Mr Smith?" "Will you hold the line?"

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 5. to punch (a ticket); to tear off (a stub)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 6. to open (something sealed) いったん封を切るとそのテープは返品できません。Once you break the seal, you can't return the tape.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 7. to start 転職も引っ越しもして、心機一転、新たなスタートを切った。I quit my job and moved so I could start off with a clean slate.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 8. to set (a limit); to do (something) in less or within a certain time; to issue (cheques, vouchers, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 9. to reduce; to decrease; to discount See also 値切る

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 10. to shake off (water, etc.); to let drip-dry; to let drain

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 11. to cross; to traverse

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 12. to criticize sharply

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 13. to act decisively; to do (something noticeable); to go first; to make (certain facial expressions, in kabuki)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 14. to turn (vehicle, steering wheel, etc.)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 15. to curl (a ball); to bend; to cut トランプをよく切ってください。Please shuffle the cards carefully.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 16. to shuffle (cards)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 17. to discard a tile Mahjong

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 18. to dismiss; to sack; to let go; to expel; to excommunicate ハリーはなんとかその川を泳ぎきった。Harry managed to swim across the river.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 19. to dig (a groove); to cut (a stencil, on a mimeograph)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 20. to trump See also 切り札

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 21. to cut (the connection between two groups) Go (game)

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 22. to start a fire (with wood-wood friction or by striking a metal against stone) also written as 鑽る

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 23. to draw (a shape) in the air (with a sword, etc.)
24. to do completely; to finish doing See also 使い切る, after the -masu stem of a verb
25. to be completely ...; to be totally ...; to be terribly ... See also 疲れ切る, after the -masu stem of a verb
26. to do clearly; to do decisively; to do firmly See also 言い切る, after the -masu stem of a verb

sentences.translation: 2. Cut the daikon into long sticks.

meanings.meaning: 1. to break; to snap; to be cut; to split; to crack 二人の子供は綱が切れるまで引っ張りあった。The two children pulled at the rope until it broke.
2. to be injured
3. to wear out; to be worn out
4. to break; to burst; to collapse
5. to wear off; to stop working; to go dead
6. to expire (time limit, etc.); to run out; to become due
7. to run out (of stock, etc.); to be exhausted; to be used up; to be sold out; to be out of ガソリンが切れかかっている。We're running out of gas.
8. to be broken off (e.g. of a relationship); to break up; to have severed ties; to be cut off; to be disconnected
9. to cut well; to be sharp このはさみは良く切れない。These scissors don't cut well.
10. to be sharp-minded; to be keen; to be shrewd; to be quick-witted; to be able
11. to be short of; to drop under (a certain figure); to beat (e.g. a record time) １００メートル、１０秒切れる？Will they break the ten-second mark in the hundred-metre race?
12. to dry off
13. to curve; to veer
14. to shuffle (cards)
15. to get angry; to snap; to blow one's top; to lose one's temper; to flip Colloquial, See also キレるあいつは、とうとう切れた。Finally, he lost his temper.
16. to be able to do completely Usually written using kana alone, after the -masu stem of a verbこの氷は薄すぎて君の体を支えきれないだろう。This ice is too thin to bear your weight.
1. to break; to snap; to be cut; to split; to crack 二人の子供は綱が切れるまで引っ張りあった。The two children pulled at the rope until it broke.
2. to be injured
3. to wear out; to be worn out
4. to break; to burst; to collapse
5. to wear off; to stop working; to go dead
6. to expire (time limit, etc.); to run out; to become due
7. to run out (of stock, etc.); to be exhausted; to be used up; to be sold out; to be out of ガソリンが切れかかっている。We're running out of gas.
8. to be broken off (e.g. of a relationship); to break up; to have severed ties; to be cut off; to be disconnected
9. to cut well; to be sharp このはさみは良く切れない。These scissors don't cut well.
10. to be sharp-minded; to be keen; to be shrewd; to be quick-witted; to be able
11. to be short of; to drop under (a certain figure); to beat (e.g. a record time) １００メートル、１０秒切れる？Will they break the ten-second mark in the hundred-metre race?
12. to dry off
13. to curve; to veer
14. to shuffle (cards)
15. to get angry; to snap; to blow one's top; to lose one's temper; to flip Colloquial, See also キレるあいつは、とうとう切れた。Finally, he lost his temper.
16. to be able to do completely Usually written using kana alone, after the -masu stem of a verbこの氷は薄すぎて君の体を支えきれないだろう。This ice is too thin to bear your weight.

sentences.translation: The two children pulled at the rope until it broke.
We're running out of gas.
These scissors don't cut well.
Will they break the ten-second mark in the hundred-metre race?
Finally, he lost his temper.
This ice is too thin to bear your weight.

meanings.meaning: 1. piece; slice; strip; scrap
2. cloth also written as 布, 裂切れはずたずたに切り裂かれた。The cloth was torn to shreds.
3. sharpness 昔のような身体の切れを取り戻したい。I wish I could get back the tone and nimbleness I once had.
4. agility 肉は何切れにしましょうか。How many slices of meat would you like?
5. counter for scraps, pieces, etc.
1. piece; slice; strip; scrap
2. cloth also written as 布, 裂切れはずたずたに切り裂かれた。The cloth was torn to shreds.
3. sharpness 昔のような身体の切れを取り戻したい。I wish I could get back the tone and nimbleness I once had.
4. agility 肉は何切れにしましょうか。How many slices of meat would you like?
5. counter for scraps, pieces, etc.

sentences.translation: The cloth was torn to shreds.
I wish I could get back the tone and nimbleness I once had.
How many slices of meat would you like?

meanings.meaning: 1. with trouble; at great pains Usually written using kana aloneせっかくの苦労もあだになった。All my pains went for nothing.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 2. rare; valuable; precious; long-awaited Usually written using kana aloneお前が大声出すから、せっかくのシャッターチャンスを逃しちゃったよ。You just made me miss the perfect shot when you hollered.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 3. kind; generous Usually written using kana aloneこういう事情ですから、残念ながら、せっかくのご招待をお受けいたしかねるのです。As such is the case, I am sorry I can't accept your kind invitation.
4. specially; especially; expressly Usually written using kana aloneせっかく雨の中を会いに行ったのに彼女は留守だった。Though I went to see her all the way in the rain, she was out.
切角 【せっかく】
切角: Ateji (phonetic) reading, Rarely-used kanji form.
1. with trouble; at great pains Usually written using kana aloneせっかくの苦労もあだになった。All my pains went for nothing.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 2. rare; valuable; precious; long-awaited Usually written using kana aloneお前が大声出すから、せっかくのシャッターチャンスを逃しちゃったよ。You just made me miss the perfect shot when you hollered.

meanings.type: Noun which may take the genitive case particle 'no'
meanings.meaning: 3. kind; generous Usually written using kana aloneこういう事情ですから、残念ながら、せっかくのご招待をお受けいたしかねるのです。As such is the case, I am sorry I can't accept your kind invitation.
4. specially; especially; expressly Usually written using kana aloneせっかく雨の中を会いに行ったのに彼女は留守だった。Though I went to see her all the way in the rain, she was out.

切角: Ateji (phonetic) reading, Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: All my pains went for nothing.
You just made me miss the perfect shot when you hollered.
As such is the case, I am sorry I can't accept your kind invitation.
Though I went to see her all the way in the rain, she was out.

3. cut; incision; notch; score

He impatiently asked for repayment.

meanings.meaning: 1. point of tangency; point of contact Mathematics

2. (electrical) contact あたりまえだが、人と人との接点は「ことば」である。その言葉によって、考えを共有し、議論している。It's obvious but the connection between people is "words". It is by those words that thoughts are shared and arguments carried out.
3. point of contact (between); connection; point of agreement; common ground
切点 【せってん】
切点: Rarely-used kanji form.

sentences.translation: It's obvious but the connection between people is "words". It is by those words that thoughts are shared and arguments carried out.

meanings.meaning: 1. clipping (of newspaper article, etc.); cutting; scrap (for a scrapbook)
2. cut-out (picture, coloured paper, etc.) Abbreviation, See also 切り抜き絵, See also 切り抜き細工
切抜き 【きりぬき】
1. cutting; severance; section; amputation; disconnection
截断 【せつだん】
截断: Rarely-used kanji form.
1. to cut off and throw away

2. to abandon; to disregard; to discard; to throw to the wolves もう少しやさしく意見してあげたらどうなの。一刀両断のもと切り捨てられた彼の立場も考えてよ。Why don't you try expressing your opinion a little more gently? Think about how he feels getting told flatly that he's being cut loose.
3. to discard (numbers after a certain decimal place); to drop; to omit; to ignore; to round down
4. to cut (someone) down; to slay
切捨てる 【きりすてる】、斬り捨てる 【きりすてる】

sentences.translation: Why don't you try expressing your opinion a little more gently? Think about how he feels getting told flatly that he's being cut loose.

meanings.meaning: 1. endless; boundless; innumerable Usually written using kana alone, See also 切りのない彼の野心にはきりがない。His ambition knows no bounds.
2. endless; never-ending; going on forever Usually written using kana alone彼のぐちにはきりがない。There is no end to his complaining.
切りが無い 【きりがない】、キリがない

sentences.translation: His ambition knows no bounds.
There is no end to his complaining.

Please don't leave valuable things here.
I keep old books with care.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb
meanings.meaning: 1. to divide; to separate; to partition; to demarcate; to delimit; to mark off グラウンドは白線で３つに区切られている。The playground is divided into three areas by white lines.

meanings.type: Godan verb with 'ru' ending, Transitive verb

sentences.translation: The playground is divided into three areas by white lines.
